mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_board (writeriuser, title, ctnt) VALUES (${writeriuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt})
INSERT INTO notice_board (writeriuser, title, ctnt) VALUES (${writeriuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt})
insert into cmt_question_board (quesiboard, cmtctnt, writerNm) values (${quesiboard}, #{cmtctnt}, #{writerNm})
mapper.select: select quesiboard, title, isanswer, hits from question_board order by quesiboard desc LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}
select title from question_board order by quesiboard desc LIMIT 3
select iboard, title, hits from notice_board order by iboard desc LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}
select title from notice_board order by iboard desc LIMIT 3

SELECT A.quesiboard, A.writeriuser, A.title, A.ctnt, A.isanswer, A.hits, A.rdt, B.nm as writerNm, B.iuser FROM question_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.writeriuser = B.iuser WHERE A.quesiboard = ${quesiboard}
select ceil(count(quesiboard) / ${recordCount}) as result from question_board
select ceil(count(iboard) / ${recordCount}) as result from notice_board
mapper.delete: delete from question_board where quesiboard = ${quesiboard} and writeriuser = ${writeriuser}
